  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddActivity
    This activity handles the creation of items and their upload to firebase
    BarcodeActivity
     
    EditActivity
    Activity allows the user to edit the selected item contents as it updates in the firestore database.
    GalleryActivity
    This activity handles using the camera and the phone's photo gallery, additionally it also handles permissions for the above.
    Item
    Item is the object content item that implements parcelable interface whose instances can be written to and restored from a Parcel - container for a message (data and object references).
    TagsActivity
    Activity displays the current list of saved tags in firebase, allows user to create new tags and set tags to selected items passed from another activity.
    ViewItemActivity
    This is a class that allows you to view an item when the item is clicked from the list
